title: Sara Gustafson Archives
description: Sara is a Holistic CHEK Practitioner, Counselor, Minister, Instructor, and Women's Health Researcher from Austin TX. She co-owns Primal Fusion Holistic Health & Performance with her husband Aleks on their sprawling Sanctuary, An-Ki, in Austin TX, where they also live with their 3 children and Sara continues her education completing her doctorate in Philosophy. She is the creator and author of Holistic Health & Performance for Women, the first course of its kind blending science and spirituality in order to provide a more accurate understanding of the female human experience.
cleaned_text: Four Feminine Archetypes and Finding Purpose](https://wellnessmama.com/podcast/486/) I'm really excited to have Sara Gustafson back on the podcast today and we focus on the mental, emotional and spiritual side of women's health.
